intro.description: Senior Software Engineer who lives and breathes DSA, because let's be real—tech stacks change, but solid logic never goes out of style. Currently vibing with Python, .NET, Angular, and Next.js. System design - Been there, built that.

items.title: Full-Stack Software Developer
description: Designing and developing end-to-end scalable features with microservices architecture using .NET, integrating with SQL Databases and deployed through DevOps CI/CD pipelines for critical healthcare applications.
Developing modular and responsive UI/UX components using Angular 18+ and TypeScript, incorporating advanced state management and performance optimization.
Conducted performance optimization, code reviews, security audits, and developed end-to-end test suites, improving release quality and reducing regression incidents by ∼60%

items.title: Member of Technical Staff
description: Engineered core product modules using .NET Core, Entity Framework, and Node.js for both SaaS and on-prem deployments, enabling modular scaling across multiple tenants.
Refactored legacy .NET Framework modules into unified .NET Core services, improving response time by ∼50% and enabling containerization.
Developed full-stack features using Angular, implemented role-based access control, and integrated telemetry to track user behavior.
Authored integration and unit test frameworks, improving code coverage to ∼89%+ and ensuring system stability during major releases.

items.title: Senior Systems Engineer

Integrated RPA with back-end systems and APIs to reduce manual effort by ∼92% and enhanced operational accuracy across client business processes

items.title: Roadmap.IO - AI-Powered Roadmap Generation

Integrated advanced LLM models including LLaMA 3.3, Qwen-QWQ, and Whisper Large v3 for contextual generation. Implemented user authentication, credit-based payments, and a dynamic UI with role-specific roadmap generation features.

items.title: Invoice Generation System
items.description: Designed and built an offline utility tool for invoice generation and inventory management. Key features include streamlined invoice creation, printing functionality, record keeping, and a basic analytics dashboard.

items.title: JsonFolio - Cool Portfolio in Minutes
items.description: A lightweight, customizable portfolio template that lets you create a stunning personal website by simply editing a JSON file. Built with Next.js and Tailwind CSS, it's fast, responsive, and easy to deploy. No multiple redeployments.

items.title: Training & Placement System

Students can view opportunities, apply, and access results. Includes faculty notices, alumni insights, and secure login-based access for stakeholders.

items.testemonyReceivedFromDesignation: NLP Researcher & Professor at Dharmsinh Desai University
items.testemonyMessage: I have taught Bhargav Design and analysis of algorithm and Software Engineering during his Bachelor of technology. I have also mentored him in laboratory work and I also mentored him during his Project on 'Training and Placement Systems'. He is true team leader, he has very high coding skills and he gives his high level of dedication and commitment towards work. He has ablities on learning new things and had an excellent grasping power. I can say that he will contribute wherever he goes since he possesses genuine interest in the subject, works tirelessly in knowing the subject well, is a quick learner and also good at time management.

Bhargav was part of my team supporting a major US telecom customer for their business process optimization program by leveraging RPA and custom-code automation. He has performed the role of automation developer and supported various process functions while part of this automation account. He is a hard working developer and I would highly recommend him for any technical and engineering profile or work.

I had the pleasure of collaborating with Bhargav at Edgeverve on the CoE Cockpit project. As a product manager, I was consistently impressed by his technical acumen, problem-solving skills, and unwavering dedication. Bhargav's ability to bridge the gap between engineering and product, coupled with his collaborative spirit, made him a valuable asset to our team. I wholeheartedly recommend Bhargav for any role that requires a talented and versatile individual.

Bhargav is a real gem to work with. He is very hard working and posses good technical understanding. He has good problem solving skills and is a quick learner. He has worked extensively on c# . Net and RPA.

I remember Bhargav as one of my enthusiastic and hard-working students. He has learned C programming, Linux OS concepts, DSA, and core computer engineering principles under me during his B.Tech program. His problem-solving capacity and eagerness towards learning the concepts in depth make him the best fit for the industry. I wish Bhargav all the very best in his future endeavors!
Bhargav was an intern in Infosys Limited. He worked enthusiastically on application development using .Net Technologies - C#, SQL Server, EF Core and various front end tools.
